review: Sorry, it is not a review. I am sure the Apple TV is very good for those within the Apple Eco-system, but for those who are not still a good one though Roku, WD etc may have better alternatives. Wanted to point out that the Apple TV this version has been long in the tooth for now and due for the next gen (better support for IOS7.1 etc) and possibly upgraded internals like dual processor, tie-ups with major content providers, more channels etc. If Apple hold the priceline then it would be worth the wait to get the next gen Apple TV.Edit March 2015 - Apple reduced price to $69 for this device, so Amazon msrp of $99 and therefore the implied savings are very incorrect!

review: Simple and easy to use, the AirPlay integration with iPad/iPhone works very well.  Selection of "channels" somewhat limited, you would get a lot more on the Roku.  But it was the AirPlay feature that had me get the AppleTV.

review: Having had a Samsung Bluray player with apps, a Sharp Smart TV, and a Roku, I bought an apple tv for the office and realized how much more of an exceptional experience it is.  We moved to Apple TVs for our house after that and we love it.
